headline: Occidental Refocuses On Oil And Carbon After OxyChem Sale To Berkshire
summary: Occidental Petroleum (NYSE:OXY) has closed the sale of its OxyChem chemicals business to Berkshire Hathaway. The company plans to use sale proceeds to reduce debt and has amended its Delaware Basin natural gas gathering contract to lower costs. For you as an investor looking at NYSE:OXY, this represents a meaningful shift in how the company is structured and funded. Occidental has historically been known for its oil and gas production as well as its chemicals arm, so transferring OxyChem to...

headline: Piper Sandler and BofA Raise Occidental (OXY) Price Targets
summary: Occidental Petroleum Corporation (NYSE:OXY) is one of the 12 Best Oil and Gas Stocks to Buy Right Now. On January 28, Piper Sandler slightly increased its price target on Occidental Petroleum Corporation (NYSE:OXY) from $46 to $47 and kept its Neutral rating on the stock.
